briefTitle: A Randomized Controlled Trial of Routine Shave Margins Versus Standard Partial Mastectomy in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: A Randomized Controlled Trial of Routine Shave Margins vs. Standard Partial Mastectomy in Breast Cancer Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Breast cancer, stage 0-3, deemed a surgically appropriate candidate for partial mastectomy with planned procedure for the same.
2. Women ≥ 18 years of age.
3. Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Patients who have received previous neoadjuvant chemotherapy
2. Patients who require a total mastectomy
3. Known metastatic breast cancer.
